attributes.action: Honours for the British divers involved in the Thailand Tham Luang cave rescue.
attributes.background: 12 boys and their football coach became trapped in a cave system after trapped after heavy rain sent torrents of floodwater into the cave. Cave diving experts John Volanthen, Richard Stanton, and Robert Harper were called in by Thai authorities to help. Discovering them after nine days underground.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
